23-018TI.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on the Long Beach Data Privacy Guidelines and Data Privacy Implementation Plan.Ryan Kurtzman, Smart Cities Program Manager, spoke.Lea Eriksen, Director of Technology & Innovation, spoke.Ryan Kurtzman, Smart Cities Program Manager, spoke.Lea Eriksen, Director of Technology & Innovation, spoke.Chair Lisa Mae Brunson, spoke.Ryan Kurtzman, Smart Cities Program Manager, spoke.Lea Eriksen, Director of Technology & Innovation, spoke.Commissioner Katherine Kelly, spoke.Ryan Kurtzman, Smart Cities Program Manager, spoke.A motion was made by Chair Mae Brunson, seconded by Commissioner Callihan, to approve recommendation.
